summary: A young man transforms into a brutal warrior as he travels the unforgiving landscape in search of his long lost brother, Hakan the Ferocious, whose people are relying on him to restore order to their kingdom.
cast: Charlie Bewley|Clive Standen|James Cosmo|Elliot Cowan|Glynis Barber|Ivan Kaye|Michael Jibson|Guy Flanagan|Theo Barklem-Biggs|Alexandra Dowling|Finlay Robertson|Michael Lindall|Francis Magee|Anna Alfieri|Marko Bennachimo|Christian Carroll|Rimmel Daniel|Susan Fordham|Maria Lee Metheringham|Deanna St Omer|Michael St Omer|Adrian Osman|Yinka Oyewole|Gwilym Pugh|Laura Sibbick|Gary Swan|Carley Watts|Peter Theobalds
keywords: viking|cave|hanging upside down|man punching a woman|stoning a woman
title: El martillo de los dioses
